query:
ALTER TABLE `venue_profiles` 
ADD COLUMN `emailVerified` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
ADD COLUMN `emailVerificationToken` varchar(255),
ADD COLUMN `emailVerificationSentAt` timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN `profileCompletionScore` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN `profileCompletionUpdatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;

ADD COLUMN `profileCompletionUpdatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
